author: praveenp
name: Eleganse-dark
description:
Theme based on old 'Eleganse' theme. I created and using this since Mint Maya and occasionally share this with my friends and they generally like this. Usually update the theme only when it became incompatible with new version Cinnamon (means I didn't do anything on this for months) .

Last update (19 Dec 2016): To make compatable with new (Cinnamon 3.2) arrow less menu
